attributes.action: Not let Jacqui Smith put a minimum age on becoming a police community support officer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Im 17 years and i have just served a year with the army, Ive just been medically discharged and would love to be a PCSO, Yet jacqui smith thinks its the right idea to only allow us at 18, Why on earth are we allowing people to handle army rifles when they cant walk around a local community making sure everything is ok. This is madness i agree most 17 year olds arent mature , but were not all the same. Please this isnt fair.
